title: Technical Operator Support Job at MacTay Consulting
content:
MacTay Consulting is one of the first and leading management consulting firms in Nigeria, providing HR services to our clients in Africa since 1982. We focus on adding value to organisations through customized solutions that meet our clients’ needs. We have a proven track record of providing excellent services that impact our clients’ businesses.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Technical Operator Support

Job Location: Mushin, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Technical Operator Support will be responsible for operation of the equipment and optimal production process for filling and packaging of cosmetic products according to safety, quality and production order.


Responsibilities


	Initiate standard operating procedures to run equipment and ensure compliance.
	Relate firsthand information to superior in a precise and timely manner.
	He ensures he works with production plan as communicated by the production team lead.
	In his area of responsibility, he ensures the compliance of the defined quality of the products in line with standards.
	Support on implementation of quality systems in close contact with the quality team.
	Trouble shoot and fix equipment related fault, call for technical intervention when deemed necessary.
	Perform regular cleaning of the equipment when out of base condition.
	Responsible for safety compliance in his area


Requirements


	ND / HND in Mechanical / Mechatronics / Electrical / Automation Engineering is required
	1 – 3 years of Experience in Cosmetic industries.
	Knowledge in MS Office
	Attention to detail with good troubleshooting skills.


Remuneration


	Salary: N165,000 monthly net
	Benefits: HMO, 13th month, Pension and Lunch.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: samson.omoyeni@mactay.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

title: Team Lead, Credit Advisory & Consulting Job at Tybtitx Services International Limited
content:
Tybtitx Services International Limited - Our client, a leading credit bureau company, is setting up a new Credit Consulting & Advisory division to provide expert services in credit, data, and information management.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Team Lead, Credit Advisory & Consulting
Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Description


	They are looking to hire a strategic and experienced professional to lead the department, drive growth, and develop innovative solutions for individuals, businesses, and government clients.


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Lead the Credit Consulting & Advisory department and drive execution of its business objectives.
	Develop and manage services including credit counselling, collections, fraud management, and consumer support.
	Identify client needs and develop tailored credit management solutions.
	Build and grow internal capacity across people, processes, and systems.
	Generate new business and position the department as a revenue-generating unit.
	Supervise and develop a high-performance team aligned with the company’s values.
	Ensure professional, timely delivery of services and achievement of revenue targets.


Job Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in a relevant discipline.
	Minimum of 7 years of work experience, with at least 4 years in a similar role.
	Strong background in banking or consulting with specialization in credit risk management.
	Experience leading new business initiatives or departments.
	Excellent communication, leadership, and problem-solving skills.
	High proficiency in Microsoft Office, especially Excel.
	MBA or M.Sc. is an added advantage.


Salary
N12,000,000 / Annum.
